languages.text:
At the start of each turn, it reloads any onboard plasma {g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoLaunchersSpace}torpedo tubes{/g}.
The bulky machinery of the loader adds +30 to the voidship's {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull{/g} but decreases its {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} by −1.
languages.original_text:
В начале каждого {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}перезаряжает{/g} все плазменные {g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoLaunchersSpace}торпедные аппараты{/g}.
Это громоздкое устройство добавляет +30 к {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}целостности корабля{/g}, но снижает его {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}скорость{/g} на 1.

traits.locale_text:
At the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, it {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}reloads{/g} any onboard plasma {g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoLaunchersSpace}torpedo tubes{/g}.
The bulky machinery of the loader adds +30 to the voidship's {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull{/g} but decreases its {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} by −1.

traits.locale_text:
В начале каждого {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}перезаряжает{/g} все плазменные {g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoLaunchersSpace}торпедные аппараты{/g}.

В начале каждого {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}перезаряжает{/g} все плазменные {g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoLaunchersSpace}торпедные аппараты{/g}.
Это громоздкое устройство добавляет +30 к {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}целостности{/g} корабля, но снижает его {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}скорость{/g} на 1.

languages.text:
Zu Beginn jedes Zugs wird nachgeladen: sämtliche {g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoLaunchersSpace}Plasma-Torpedorohre{/g} an Bord.
Die sperrige Nachlade-Maschinerie fügt dem {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}Rumpf{/g} des Raumschiffs +30 hinzu, reduziert aber dessen {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}Geschwindigkeit{/g} um −1.
languages.original_text:
At the start of each turn, it reloads any onboard plasma {g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoLaunchersSpace}torpedo tubes{/g}.
The bulky machinery of the loader adds +30 to the voidship's {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull{/g} but decreases its {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} by −1.

traits.locale_text:
Zu Beginn jedes {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} wird {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}nachgeladen{/g}: sämtliche {g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoLaunchersSpace}Plasma-Torpedorohre{/g} an Bord.
Die sperrige Nachlade-Maschinerie fügt dem {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}Rumpf{/g} des Raumschiffs +30 hinzu, reduziert aber dessen {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}Geschwindigkeit{/g} um −1.

languages.text:
Au début de chaque tour, elle recharge tous les {g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoLaunchersSpace}tubes lance-torpilles{/g} à plasma situés à bord.
L'équipement encombrant du chargeur ajoute +30 à la {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}coque{/g} du vaisseau spatial mais réduit sa {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}vitesse{/g} de −1.
languages.original_text:
At the start of each turn, it reloads any onboard plasma {g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoLaunchersSpace}torpedo tubes{/g}.
The bulky machinery of the loader adds +30 to the voidship's {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull{/g} but decreases its {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} by −1.

traits.locale_text:
Au début de chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, elle {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}recharge{/g} tous les {g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoLaunchersSpace}tubes lance-torpilles{/g} à plasma situés à bord.
L'équipement encombrant du chargeur ajoute +30 à la {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}coque{/g} du vaisseau spatial mais réduit sa {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}vitesse{/g} de -1.

languages.text:
每个回合开始时，会{g|Encyclopedia:Reload}重新装填{/g}船上的所有等离子{g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoLaunchersSpace}鱼雷发射管{/g}。
由于装载机过于庞大，虚空舰的{g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}舰体{/g}耐久提高30点，但{g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}速度{/g}降低1点。
languages.original_text:
At the start of each turn, it reloads any onboard plasma {g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoLaunchersSpace}torpedo tubes{/g}.
The bulky machinery of the loader adds +30 to the voidship's {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull{/g} but decreases its {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} by −1.

traits.locale_text:
每个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，会{g|Encyclopedia:Reload}重新装填{/g}船上的所有等离子{g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoLaunchersSpace}鱼雷发射管{/g}。
由于装载机过于庞大，虚空舰的{g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}舰体{/g}耐久提高30点，但{g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}速度{/g}降低1点。

languages.text:
Recarga cualquier {g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoLaunchersSpace}lanzatorpedos{/g} de plasma de la nave al comienzo de cada turno.
El prominente tamaño de este cargador añade +30 al {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}casco{/g} de la nave, pero reduce −1 su {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}velocidad{/g}.
languages.original_text:
At the start of each turn, it reloads any onboard plasma {g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoLaunchersSpace}torpedo tubes{/g}.
The bulky machinery of the loader adds +30 to the voidship's {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull{/g} but decreases its {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} by −1.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:Reload}Recarga{/g} cualquier {g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoLaunchersSpace}lanzatorpedos{/g} de plasma de la nave al comienzo de cada {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.
El prominente tamaño de este cargador añade +30 al {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}casco{/g} de la nave, pero reduce −1 su {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}velocidad{/g}.

languages.text:
ターン開始時、搭載されているプラズマ{g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoLaunchersSpace}魚雷発射管{/g}をリロードする。
ローダーのかさばる機械がヴォイドシップの{g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}船体{/g}に30基追加されるが、{g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}スピード{/g}は1減少。
languages.original_text:

The bulky machinery of the loader adds +30 to the voidship's {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull{/g} but decreases its {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} by −1.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時、搭載されているプラズマ{g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoLaunchersSpace}魚雷発射管{/g}を{g|Encyclopedia:Reload}リロード{/g}する。
ローダーのかさばる機械がヴォイドシップの{g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}船体{/g}に30基追加されるが、{g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}スピード{/g}は1減少。
